traits.Keen Sight: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.Multiattack: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.
actions.Beak: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
